ProjectBrowseView.ActivateText: All future references imported via the browser extension will be added to this project
ProjectBrowseView.ShareText: To share this project with others, please type or paste their email addresses and click Share
ProjectBrowseView.CloneText: This operation will clone this project and all of its references
ProjectBrowseView.DeleteText: Doing so will delete the metadata of this project permanently. The references of this project can still be found in the References View
ProjectBrowseView.DeleteTextShare: This operation will stop you from accessing this shared project in the future. Are you sure?
ProjectBrowseView.DeleteTextConfirm: Confirm you want to delete this project by typing its name:
ProjectBrowseView.whatIsName: What is the name of this new project?
ProjectBrowseView.errorLoading: Errors in loading shared projects. Please try refreshing this page.

ProjectDetailsView.shareOthersDialog: To share this project with others, please type or paste their email addresses and click Share.
ProjectDetailsView.morethan1ref: ... more than 1 references are newly added; refresh the page to see them ...
ProjectDetailsView.ourExtension: Our browser extensions support one-click reference importation and help you manage your citations/references in Google Docs and Overleaf.
ProjectDetailsView.ifWriteInWord: If you write in Word, you will also need to install our Word Add-in to manage your citations/references in Word documents.
ProjectDetailsView.itOnlyTakes: It only takes a click for you to import references to this project from major academic search aggregators:
ProjectDetailsView.anExampleScholar: an example of searching for "technology" on Google Scholar
ProjectDetailsView.anExampleUserAuth: an example paper titled "User Authentication via Electrical Muscle Stimulation"
ProjectDetailsView.anExampleRfid: an example paper titled "RFID Tag and RF Structures on a Paper Substrate Using Inkjet-Printing Technology"
ProjectDetailsView.anExampleRethink: an example paper titled "Rethinking student-teacher relationships in higher education: a multidimensional approach"
ProjectDetailsView.addmanually: You can also add a reference manually by clicking the button by the search bar.
ProjectDetailsView.updateProjectInfo: Updating your project information allows us to provide the most helpful insights into your literature.
ProjectDetailsView.numberOfRecommendations: <0><0>{{number}}</0></0><1>articles are recommended based on your writing and the references in this project</1>
ProjectDetailsView.accessInsightDashboardNote: Accessing Insight Dashboard is a premium feature. You can upgrade your account to use it.
ProjectDetailsView.accessInsightDashboardNoteFree: Insight Dashboard is not supported for projects owned by users of the free tier.
ProjectDetailsView.analyzingRightNow: We are analysing your writing and the references in this project to provide the best article recommendations. Please check again later.
ProjectDetailsView.targetVenue: What is your target venue (journal/conference) for this project?
ProjectDetailsView.gotIt: Got it. It will take us sometime to analyse the target venue!
ProjectDetailsView.updatingVenueNote: Updating the venue information allows us to analyze your target journal or conference. The analytics provides insights into the trending topics and standards of the venue.
ProjectDetailsView.searchAPaper: Search for a paper in this project

ReferenceBrowseView.MoreThanOne: ... more than 1 references are newly added; refresh the page to see them ...
ReferenceBrowseView.OneClickImport: It only takes a click for you to import references to this project from major academic search aggregators:
ReferenceBrowseView.GSExample: an example of searching for 'technology' on Google Scholar
ReferenceBrowseView.ACMExample: an example paper titled 'User Authentication via Electrical Muscle Stimulation'
ReferenceBrowseView.IEEEExample: an example paper titled 'RFID Tag and RF Structures on a Paper Substrate Using Inkjet-Printing Technology'
ReferenceBrowseView.SpringerExample: an example paper titled 'Rethinking student-teacher relationships in higher education: a multidimensional approach'
ReferenceBrowseView.AlsoManual: You can also add a reference manually by clicking the ADD REFERENCES button
ReferenceBrowseView.SelectedProject: the project that you want to add the selected references to
ReferenceBrowseView.wasAddedToProject: {{count}} selected paper was added successfully to Project {{project}}
ReferenceBrowseView.wasAddedToProject_plural: {{count}} selected papers were added successfully to Project {{project}}
ReferenceBrowseView.wasAddedToProject_0: The selected paper(s) have already been added to Project {{project}}
ReferenceBrowseView.searchAPaper: Search for a paper in all the added references

application.ChromeText: Citasion's free browser extension helps you import citations from Google Scholar, PubMed, ACM Digital Library, and many research aggregators, as well as manage references in
application.WordText: Citasion's free Word Add-in helps you manage citations and references in Word.
application.WordNote2: extension is still required for reference importation

AccountView.Name: Name
AccountView.PremiumFeatures1: Unlimited number of references and projects
AccountView.ProcessingInfo: Your transaction is being processed. If this page does not update itself, you can refresh it in minutes.
AccountView.CancelText: Are you sure to cancel your subscription of Citasion Premium?
AccountView.willExpire: Your premium trial will expire by .
AccountView.currentSubscription: Your current subscription is canceled but you can still use Citasion premium untill the expiration date.

HomeView.title: Citasion: Smart online reference management
HomeView.description: Citasion is a free reference management tool that makes online academic writing effective. Getting started is simple — download Citasion's extension ...
HomeView.intro: Intuitive reference management built for collaborations on the web.
HomeView.check2: Sharable reference projects for collaborative writing
HomeView.check5: Smart insights into your literature and reference list
HomeView.VideoTitle: Citasion - Need Help Writing a Paper?
HomeView.note1Text: A project-based reference management built for the web. Works with Google Docs, Word, and Overleaf.
HomeView.note2Text: Share your references projects and insights with others. Write and manage references collaboratively and with ease.
HomeView.note3Text: A.I. powered system finds the paper you are about to cite, and provides tailored recommendations for your research.
HomeView.worksOnline: Works Online Where You Write and Cite
HomeView.getStarted: Get started for free and manage your references with ease
HomeView.wordAddInNote: If you write in Word, you will also need <2><0>our Word Add-in</0></2>.

LoginIframeView.protectionNote: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the <2>Google Privacy Policy</2> and <6>Terms of Service</6> apply.

LoginView.captchaNote: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the <2>Google Privacy Policy</2> and <6>Terms of Service</6> apply.
LoginView.title: Citasion: Login
LoginView.description: Log in to your Citasion Account and manage your references with ease.

RegisterView.title: Citasion: Register An Account
RegisterView.description: Register a Citasion Account and manage your references with ease.

EmailVerification.title: Email Verification Required
EmailVerification.text: You need to verify your email address before accessing your account. Please check your email and follow the provided instruction in an email from Citasion

AuthRedirect.errorVerify: We were unable to verify your email. Please contact support@citasion.com

CampaignStarter.elevate: Elevate Your Reference Management to a New Level
CampaignStarter.goBeyond: Go beyond reference management. Choose a premium plan to ensure effective collaborative academic writing and get deep insights into your literature for every paper you write.
CampaignStarter.currentList: The current list of other research aggregators includes ACM Digital Library, PubMed, Springer, and IEEE Xplore. We are working hard to expand the list constantly.
CampaignStarter.identifyYearGaps: Identify year gaps in your literature review
CampaignStarter.recommendTheMost: Recommend the most relevant literature to the paper that you are working on
CampaignStarter.grabTheNext: Grab the next reference that you are about to cite.
CampaignStarter.formsOfPayment: What forms of payment do you accept?
CampaignStarter.formsOfPaymentAccepted: We accept major credit cards (e.g., Visa, American Express, Mastercard, Discover) and PayPal.
CampaignStarter.premiumPlan: What does the Premium Plan include?
CampaignStarter.premiumPlanDetails: Citasion's Premium Plan offers unlimited numbers of projects and references, advanced literature analytics, recommendations, venue analytics, and unlimited PDF paper storage.
CampaignStarter.volumeDiscounts: Do you have any volume discounts?
CampaignStarter.tryPremium: Can I try Citasion Premium for free?
CampaignStarter.tryPremiumAnswer: Yes! All users on the Free Plan can try out Citasion Premium for 90 days. All it takes is to create a free Citasion account. After that, you can revist this page, and the option of free trial will show up.
CampaignStarter.pageDesc: Take your reference management to the next level of efficiency.
CampaignStarter.premiumExpire: Your premium trial will expire by {{expiryDate}}.
CampaignStarter.volumeDiscountsAnswer: Yes! We offer volume discounts on annual plans for more than 5 members. Please <2><0>contact us</0></2> if you’re buying a plan for more than 5 members.

NotAuthorized.mightLost: You might be lost. You are not authorized to access this page.

NotFoundView.mightLost: You might be lost. The page you are looking for isn’t here.

PlanChange.experience: Experience the Full Power of Citasion
PlanChange.premiumfeatures: Premium users can manage unlimited number of references.
PlanChange.literaturesummary: Worrying about if there are gaps in your literature review? Want to find similar papers but have difficulties in formatting effective queries? We have you covered.
PlanChange.collaborateSummary: Work with other researchers through project-based reference management to maximize the efficiency of collaborative academic writing.
PlanChange.testimonial: Citasion doesn't only manage my references but also allow me to have confidence in my literature review.
PlanChange.premiumPromoText: Citasion Premium helps you conduct comprehensive and insightful literature review.
PlanChange.expiry: Your existing plan will expire by {{date}}
PlanChange.newPlanExpiry: Your new plan starts by {{date}} and you’ll be charged ${{bill}} + tax on that day
PlanChange.futureCharge: You would be charged on a {{plan}} basis in the future
PlanChange.paypalredirect: You will be directed to Paypal to confirm the change of your plan. You will receive an email from us when your plan is updated successfully
PlanChange.paypalemail: You will receive an email from us when your plan is updated successfully
PlanChange.transactionProgress: Transaction in progress. Please do not refresh the page.
PlanChange.weNotice: We notice that you haven't reached the expiration date of your canceled subscription. You can use the premium service until the expiration date. If you purchase a new plan, you will NOT get a refund for the remaining time of the canceled subscription.
PlanChange.changesWillBeEffective: Changes will take effect in the next billing cycle.
PlanChange.paymentChangeAgreement: The change of payment method will be effective in your next billing cycle. By clicking the Update Payment Method button above, you are agreeing to our <2>Terms of Service</2>. If you have questions, you can reach out to us by sending an email to us at <4>support@citasion.com</4>.
PlanChange.paymentAgreement: Your subscription will automatically renew every <1>{{frequency}}</1> month(s). You will be charged $<4>{{price}}</4> on each renewal until you cancel in your account settings. If you cancel, previous charges will not be refunded, but you may continue to use the service until the end of the term you paid for. By clicking the "Check out" button above, you are agreeing to our <7>Terms of Service</7>. If you have questions, you can reach out to us by sending an email to us at <9>support@citasion.com</9>.

uninstall.improve: How else can we improve Citasion?
uninstall.helpUsText: We know our reference management tool isn’t perfect, and we’re committed to making it better for you. Can you let us know why you uninstalled the Citasion extension?
uninstall.title: Citasion: Sorry to see you go

FeaturesAnimation.rec2Text: Graphically based passwords (using images) were used in the development of a method. The novel authentication system was implemented in a web-based prototype application. Alternative solutions were also examined by researchers. However, even as early as 1998 in a request for comments, a study has investigated the possibility of utilizing one-time password methods in websites (Haller, Metz, Nesser, & Straw, 1998).
FeaturesAnimation.rec2TextNewLine: Graphically based passwords (using images) were used in the development of a method. The novel authentication system was implemented in a web-based prototype application.\A\A Alternative solutions were also examined by researchers. However, even as early as 1998 in a request for comments, a study has investigated the possibility of utilizing one-time password methods in websites (Haller, Metz, Nesser, & Straw, 1998).
FeaturesAnimation.rec1Text: Alternative solutions were also examined by researchers. However, even as early as 1998 in a request for comments, a study has investigated the possibility of utilizing one-time password methods in websites (Haller, Metz, Nesser, & Straw, 1998).\A\AReferences\AHaller, N., Metz, C., Nesser, P., & Straw, M. (1998). A one-time password system. Network Working Group Request for Comments, 2289.
FeaturesAnimation.rec1TextPreFinal: Alternative solutions were also examined by researchers. However, even as early as 1998 in a request for comments, a study has investigated the possibility of utilizing one-time password methods in websites.
FeaturesAnimation.rec3TextPre: However, even as early as 1998 in a request for comments, a study has investigated the possibility of utilizing one-time password methods in websites (Haller, Metz, Nesser, & Straw, 1998).
